name: Florensia
description: Florensia is a Free-to-Play MMORPG and with itÂ´s 3D anime style the game shows you its legendary worlds ashore and at sea. Mysterious islands, the great ocean, dungeons, picturesque pirates and dangerous monsters are waiting to be discovered.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Higher Processor: Penitum4 1.3GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: A graphic card thats supports at least DirectX 9 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Higher Processor: Pentium 4 2,4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: A graphic card thats supports at least DirectX 9 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This is a mmorpg. This game is free, looks like a alpha build, is dead like all hell, has a repetetive soundtrack, is not good for new players and can not even be put into full screen. Sorry I can not stomache this *game* anymore. Have fun, enjoy and find a better mmorpg :)

Dead Mans Game. I remember years where Florensia were full of players in every District. Now you can hear yourself breath in this game. Would only recommend this game if there would be a new grafic patch w/ more community. 7yr old grafics suck tbh.

This game is terrible.  Its super laggy and and just weird.  I played this game for 12 mins and i'm like nope and exited the game. Plus I had to load this game about 5 times before I could actually play it. All Is this game is awesome. Not.
The best game :) I've been playing this game more than 5 years.. i love it..
Game sucks, no patch, only item shop updates.
If you like Luna, FLYFF, and others like it and don't want to spend a month learnding 30 hotkeys and the like this is a pretty good one.

Wow what a game, played it since it came out and had lots of fun. also spent some money on it back in the day. I along side side some friends played 1000s of hrs. and it was fun. now its a bit empty and it was not really updated.  but i still love it. It was my first mmorpg   Id say, go in with low expectation. it is p2w and it is slow but my oppinion , it is fun.  A word of warning. once you are lvl 80= you will find yourself to be a bit alone :) was just my experience.  Give it a try.
Logged in assessed the graphics, UI, and the general flow of the game... Promptly uninstalled and found better use for my time.
